text: A jet nut,. also known as a k-nut,.. is a special type of hex locknut that is commonly used in the aerospace and automotive racing industries.Smith, pp. 106–107. It has a flange on one end of the nut, the hex is smaller than a standard sized hex nut, and it is shorter than a standard hex nut. It achieves its locking action by using an elliptical offset on the un-flanged end of the nut.. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Bibliography=== * . Category:Nuts (hardware)
title: Jet nut
